name: Me And My Dogs: Friends Forever
synopsis: Have you always dreamed of having a cute dog to cuddle? Thanks to Me And My Dogs: Friends Forever, you can have up to three of the cutest pups imaginable at the same time and take them with you everywhere you go! Chose from friendly Labradors, playful Chow Chows and smart Beagles! Like real dogs, you’ll have to take care of them, feed them, wash them, and give them lots of love. Play with them at the park and teach them lots of tricks or train them for competitions at the stadium. You can even call them like in real life thanks to the microphone! • 3 different breeds: Labradors, Chow Chows and Beagles • Really teach your dogs: Make or break habits with rewards and punishment • Mini-games: Play with your doggie or teach him new tricks • 3-D petting view makes your interactions with your dog more realistic • You can now call your dog just like in real life with the microphone • Thanks to the camera feature, you can add your photo to your in-game profile
